name: Tsun Tsun Kumi 2: Moji Moji Bakkun
overview: Tsun Tsun Kumi 2 - Moji Mojo Bakkun is the second game in the Tsun Tsun games for the Playstation console. The game uses the same characters and the same world from the first one, but this time the gameplay is a maze game in the style of classic games like Pac-man and others. The goal of the game is to the get 3 collection of letters that are around the maze avoid being hit by the enemies that are around there. The game only have 1 life so the game is over when an enemy touch the player. There are different game modes like the time trial mode (in which the player have to find those 3 letters in a time limit but this time there are no enemies in the maze).
